IconButton Playground

Core IconButton Component

This demonstrates the core AgnosticUI IconButton component with full accessibility features and APG compliance. IconButtons are designed for actions that can be represented by a single icon or symbol.

  • Semantic button element foundation
  • Space/Enter keyboard activation
  • Almost headless styling approach
  • APG-compliant accessibility with proper ARIA labeling
  • Support for Unicode symbols and custom SVG icons

Visual Variants

IconButtons support different visual variants to match your design system and indicate different action types.

Ghost (Default)

Primary

Secondary

Danger

<ag-icon-button label="Settings" unicode="âš™" variant="ghost"></ag-icon-button> <ag-icon-button label="Save" unicode="ðŸ’¾" variant="primary"></ag-icon-button> <ag-icon-button label="Edit" unicode="âœŽ" variant="secondary"></ag-icon-button> <ag-icon-button label="Delete" unicode="ðŸ—‘" variant="danger"></ag-icon-button>

Size Variants

IconButtons support different sizes to fit various UI contexts.

<ag-icon-button label="Close" unicode="Ã—" size="xs"></ag-icon-button> <ag-icon-button label="Close" unicode="Ã—" size="sm"></ag-icon-button> <ag-icon-button label="Close" unicode="Ã—" size="md"></ag-icon-button> <ag-icon-button label="Close" unicode="Ã—" size="lg"></ag-icon-button> <ag-icon-button label="Close" unicode="Ã—" size="xl"></ag-icon-button>

Custom SVG Icons

IconButtons can contain custom SVG icons for more sophisticated graphics while maintaining accessibility.

<ag-icon-button label="Close dialog"> <svg>...</svg> </ag-icon-button>

Button States

IconButtons support disabled, loading, and pressed states with proper ARIA attributes.

<ag-icon-button label="Disabled" unicode="ðŸš«" disabled></ag-icon-button> <ag-icon-button label="Loading" unicode="âŸ³" loading></ag-icon-button> <ag-icon-button label="Toggle" unicode="â˜…" pressed="true"></ag-icon-button>

React Integration

The ReactIconButton wrapper provides seamless integration with React applications while maintaining all the accessibility features of the underlying web component.

Vue Integration

The VueIconButton wrapper provides seamless integration with Vue 3 applications using the Composition API while maintaining all the accessibility features of the underlying web component.

Svelte Integration

AgnosticUI IconButton components work excellently with Svelte using direct web component integration. This approach provides the best performance and reliability while maintaining full reactivity and all accessibility features.

Installation & Usage

Get started with the IconButton component in your project.

# Install AgnosticUI npm install agnosticui # Import the icon button component import 'agnosticui/lib/src/components/IconButton/core/_IconButton.ts'; # Or eject for customization agui eject icon-button ./src/components/ui/
